an10.223:4.1: “Someone with thirty qualities is cast down to hell.
an10.223:4.3: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, and meaningless. They’re covetous, malicious, and have wrong view. They encourage others to do these things. And they approve of these things.
an10.223:4.13: Someone with these thirty qualities is cast down to hell.
an10.223:5.1: Someone with thirty qualities is raised up to heaven.
an10.223:5.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, or meaningless. They’re contented, kind-hearted, and have right view. They encourage others to do these things. And they approve of these things.
an10.223:5.13: Someone with these thirty qualities is raised up to heaven.”
